conversation.content: I'm in the mood for a wild and creepy movie with some laughs. Got any suggestions?
Do you prefer your horror to have a sci-fi twist or more of a straight-up scary vibe?
I love when horror movies mix in aliens or mutants, something a bit chaotic and funny too!
You should totally check out Slither! It’s a hilarious and gory alien invasion in a small town with crazy mutants and wild transformations. Perfect mix of horror, sci-fi, and comedy! 🎬😂❤️
